name: An Oddly Satisfying Game ➰
description:
Take a breath.

Think.

Move the blocks.

Build your perfect own loop.

Enjoy your victory. it's satisfying to look at.

***

⚠️Alpha demo⚠️

This an alpha demo of the game.

It's an overview of gameplay possibilities. 

We hope you are gonna enjoy it even though there are still some issues.

Share your feedback to help us improve our game. 🎯GOAL🎯

Move the blocks to let the ball reach the finishing line.

Bonus : move the blocks during the recording phase to create a beautiful loop.

***

🎮How to play🎮

Play in full screen with sound to improve your experience.

Click on the ball to throw it.
